content: Research note: Brightshore antibiotic resistance study (protocol BRS-224) identified 12 cases of treatment-resistant orbital cellulitis in diabetic patients with notable geographic clustering in the Harborview district. Mean age 49.3 years, 58% female. Hospitalization rates increased 37% Q1 2024 compared to previous year. Study presented at IDWeek 2024 conference (abstract #4417).
